name: LSD Golf (Weekly game jam 116 entry)
description:
Golf is a boring game. It's just people hitting balls. But what if golf was on LSD?

LSD golf is a game in which you (a putter) must hit a golf ball into various holes. However it's not so easy- your putter is a bit... sporadic.

Have fun for minutes as you slowly get emotionally attached to an annoying putter in this fun-for-all-the-family game.

Controls

Hold mouse down anywhere on the screen to get the putter to follow your mouse.

Press the left or right arrow keys to make the putter rotate.

Press R to restart level

There are currently 6 levels
